description: This file defines the HomeShell widget, a Flutter StatefulWidget responsible for the main layout of the application's home screen, including top navigation bar, left navigation rail, and content area with different panels.

classes.name: HomeShell
classes.description: A StatefulWidget that manages the main UI layout for the application's home screen.

classes.name: _HomeShellState
classes.description: The state class for HomeShell, managing UI state such as selected navigation index and building UI components.

methods.name: _buildTopBar
methods.description: Constructs the top app bar containing the app title, beta label, search and notification icons, and user avatar.

methods.name: _navItem
methods.description: Creates a NavigationRailDestination widget with specified icon and label.

methods.name: _buildLeftNav
methods.description: Builds the NavigationRail widget for primary navigation options.

methods.name: _buildContent
methods.description: Returns the main content widget based on the selected navigation index, displaying different panels.

methods.name: _placeholderPanel
methods.description: Creates a placeholder panel with a title, subtitle, and a grid of cards to display content.

methods.name: build
methods.description: Builds the overall Scaffold layout combining top bar, navigation, and content areas.
